extendedInfo.description: Click on a glass block to destroy it!You will get 10-120 points for a blue block you destroy or which fall out of the floor.You will cost 10-120 points and a life for a red block you destroy or which fall out of the floor.Black block could not be destroyed or moved.Green block will change color to blue or red randomly when you click on it.Perfect game : all red blocks remain intact, for bonus you will get an extra life.Destroy all the blue and green blocks, so , have fun!keywordsï¼glass tower ï¼ physicalnew featuresï¼* 29 exciting levels* suitable for different resolutions* bugs fixed

reviews.title: Not loading
reviews.comment: I just downloaded the game and it wouldn\'t even start and i press new game and it froze .   -_-
reviews.author: Gadier Garcia

reviews.title: Used to be ok
reviews.comment: Now freezes upon trying to play, music continues to play after frozen game is closed
reviews.author: John Brown

reviews.title: Very fun when it works
reviews.comment: The game used to work pretty reliably, but now it\'s extremely common to freeze upon startup. Like 9 out of 10 times it freezes. I wish it were fixed so I could continue playing!!
reviews.author: Andrew DuBuc

reviews.title: Not ALL THE WAY impossible
reviews.comment: Actually it is not impossible. You can catch some of the power-ups if you press the top of it multiple times. I did it. I wonder why I don\'t lose a life when I retry.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: HTC ONE X+
reviews.comment: This is not compatible with handset. Really disappointed.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Lags and you can\'t see the entire tower. Graphics suck
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Freezes.never got to play it
reviews.comment: I heard the reviews that it was cool.but couldn\'t even play it.I uninstalled it before it gave me viruses.
reviews.author: Claudia Ruelas

reviews.title: cj56
reviews.comment: Finally found it. I used to play on a friends phone & I luved it. But I culdnt remember the name. I\'m so happy I found this game
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Epic game
reviews.comment: But.. if u can fix the problem not restarting from lvl 1 when losing, like d iphone,  ty
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: C,mon Everyone luvs smashing glass great game
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ted a
reviews.comment: Great game It\'s a good way to pass time!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Negative stars would be more accurate.
reviews.comment: This game is terrible. You can\'t ever get anywhere because you lose so many lives restarting levels and can never catch bonuses. Also has a bad lag. By far the worst version of this game I\'ve ever played.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Poor
reviews.comment: Same here. When you down load and get to the home screen you press new game it just freezes. Please fix
reviews.author: Brittney Horton

reviews.title: luv it
reviews.comment: best game ever
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Upset finally found it and cannot play on my tablet
reviews.author: Jennifer Fergusson

reviews.title: Fix please
reviews.comment: I have the galaxy and have tried to download it 4 times! I love this game but it won\'t work, it just gets to the start sceen and stops!
reviews.author: Destine Webb

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Love this app,has only force closed on me one time,great concept!
reviews.author: David Moreand

reviews.title: Don\'t save level progress!!!
reviews.comment: Each time u finish a level, it don\'t save the data. When u lose a level, it takes u back aaaaall the way to the beginning...ugh gets frustrating!! Please fix this its fun. It would be a great game if it not had been for this. Uninstalling for now..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Jr
reviews.comment: Would not open,downloaded 4 times thinking something was not right. You would get to opening screen then stop, none of the buttons worked then the app would say foreclosed. And close down.
reviews.author: A Google User
